mapper.select: SELECT B.score, B.item1_result, B.item2_result, B.item3_result, B.item4_result, B.item5_result, B.item6_result, B.item7_result, B.item8_result, B.item9_result, B.item10_result, B.item11_result, B.item12_result, B.item13_result, B.item14_result, B.item15_result, B.item16_result FROM ( SELECT t2.user_id, t2.ip_address FROM user AS t0, client AS t2 WHERE t0.department_idx = #{departmentIdx} AND t0.user_id = t2.user_id) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY user_id, ip_address ORDER BY check_time DESC) AS r0 FROM user_result WHERE DATE_FORMAT(check_time, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth} ) AS B ON A.user_id = B.user_id AND A.ip_address = B.ip_address AND B.r0 = 1 AND B.in_schedule = 1 WHERE (B.item1_result + B.item2_result + B.item3_result + B.item4_result + B.item5_result + B.item6_result + B.item7_result + B.item8_result + B.item9_result + B.item10_result + B.item11_result + B.item12_result + B.item13_result + B.item14_result + B.item15_result + B.item16_result) > 0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.department_idx, A.user_id, B.ip_address FROM user as A, client as B WHERE A.user_id = B.user_id AND A.department_idx LIKE CONCAT(#{departmentIdx}, '%') ) AS t0 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY user_id, ip_address ORDER BY check_time DESC) AS r0 FROM user_result WHERE DATE_FORMAT(check_time, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth} AND in_schedule = 1 ) AS t1 ON t0.user_id = t1.user_id AND t0.ip_address = t1.ip_address
WHERE t1.r0 = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user u, client c, (SELECT b.idx FROM department a JOIN department b ON a.idx = #{departmentIdx} AND b.code LIKE CONCAT(a.code, '%')) d WHERE u.user_id = c.user_id AND u.department_idx = d.idx AND c.department_idx = d.idx

SELECT COUNT(*) AS runPc, AVG(score) AS score FROM ( SELECT t1.user_id, t1.ip_address FROM client AS t1, user AS t2, (SELECT b.idx FROM department a JOIN department b ON a.idx = #{departmentIdx} AND b.code LIKE CONCAT(a.code, '%')) d WHERE t1.user_id = t2.user_id AND t1.department_idx = d.idx ) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY user_id, ip_address ORDER BY check_time DESC) AS r0 FROM user_result WHERE in_schedule = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(check_time, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth}) AS B ON A.user_id = B.user_id AND A.ip_address = B.ip_address WHERE B.r0 = 1 AND (B.item1_result + B.item2_result + B.item3_result + B.item4_result + B.item5_result + B.item6_result + B.item7_result + B.item8_result + B.item9_result + B.item10_result + B.item11_result + B.item12_result + B.item13_result + B.item14_result + B.item15_result + B.item16_result) > 0

SELECT item1_result, item2_result, item3_result, item4_result, item5_result, item6_result, item7_result, item8_result, item9_result, item10_result, item11_result, item12_result, item13_result, item14_result, item15_result, item16_result FROM ( SELECT t1.user_id, t1.ip_address FROM client AS t1, user AS t2, (SELECT b.idx FROM department a JOIN department b ON a.idx = #{departmentIdx} AND b.code LIKE CONCAT(a.code, '%')) d WHERE t1.user_id = t2.user_id AND t1.department_idx = d.idx ) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY user_id, ip_address ORDER BY check_time DESC) AS r0 FROM user_result WHERE in_schedule = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(check_time, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth}) AS B ON A.user_id = B.user_id AND A.ip_address = B.ip_address WHERE B.r0 = 1 AND (B.item1_result + B.item2_result + B.item3_result + B.item4_result + B.item5_result + B.item6_result + B.item7_result + B.item8_result + B.item9_result + B.item10_result + B.item11_result + B.item12_result + B.item13_result + B.item14_result + B.item15_result + B.item16_result) > 0
